resources.string: Do you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy?

Ware—Your personal database for keeping your watch and read lists. \n\nWare came from the words watchlist and readlist. “Wa” from watch and “re” from read. This is a revamped notes app dedicated to people who are fond of watching movies/series/dramas and reading books, also called bookworms. This is an application that makes it easier for users to keep track of the things they want to watch and read.
Don\'t have an account? Sign Up

1. Acceptance: By using Ware, you agree 
to there Terms of use. 
2. User Content: You are responsible for 
the content you add to Ware. You grant 
Ware a non-exclusive, worldwide, 
royalty-free, license to use, reproduce 
modify, adapt, publish, distribute, and 
 display your content. 
3. Prohibited Conduct: you may not use 
Ware to: 
 -Upload harmful, illegal, or offensive
 content.
 -Promote or facilitate illegal activities.
 -Violate the rights of others. 
4. Termination: Ware may terminate 
your account or access to the app at
any time, for any reason.

1. Information collection: Ware collects 
information you provide when you 
when you create an acount or use the 
app. This may include your name, 
email address, and the content you add. 
2. Information Use: We use your 
information to: 
 -Provide the Ware service. 
 -Improve the app and its features. 
 -Communicate with you about Ware. 
3. Data Security: We take reasonable 
measures to protect your information, 
but we cannot guarantee absolute 
security. 
4. Third-Party Services: Ware may use 
third-party services that collect and 
process your data. Please refer to their 
privacy policies for more information. 
5. Changes: We may update these 
Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Your
acceptance of the updated policies. 
6. Contact: If you have questions or 
concerns, please contact us at 
ware@realmail.com.

By using Ware, you agree to these
Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Ware—Your personal database for 
keeping you watch and read list. 

Ware came from the words watchlist 
and readlist. “Wa” from watch and “re” 
from read. This is a revamped notes app 
dedicated to people who are fond of 
watching movies/series/dramas and 
reading books, also called bookworms. 
This is an application that makes it easier 
for users to keep track of the things 
they want to watch and read.
